title: Ramona Boxed Set
description: Beverly Cleary, beloved author of the Ramona series and Henry Huggins, has been a part of America’s childhood for over 50 years. Now enjoy this rare collection of some of your favorite characters and their funny, heart-warming stories. In this audio collection you’ll Ellen TebbitsOtis SpoffordEmily's Runaway ImaginationMitch and AmySocksMuggie Maggie
author: Beverly Cleary
